title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ on Tow Truck Service
content: Every successful entrepreneur knows the value of a good side hustle. Launch the Tow Truck Service — paying out 2X GTA$ this week — from your Salvage Yard to pick up vehicles around the greater Los Santos area and bring them back to be stripped for parts, while simultaneously bolstering your chop shop’s reputation and passive income.
